welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Emeryville, where city charm meets waterfront views! Get ready to explore our vibrant community known for its thriving arts scene and delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay and soak in all that Emeryville has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'OAK Free WiFi' from their device's WiFi settings.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Air Terminal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buchanan Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sacramento Mather Airport handles all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Sacramento Mather Airport serves private and charter flights, providing a more personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Napa County Airport provides services for commercial and private aircraft.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Napa County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Half Moon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palo Alto Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Palo Alto Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
